title: PRIVACY POLICY
content: We respect your privacy rights and recognize the importance of secure transactions and information privacy. This Privacy Policy describes how Sygence and its affiliates (collectively "Sygence," "we," "our," "us") collect, use, share or otherwise process your personal information through Sygence's website and related platforms.

This Privacy Policy is an electronic agreement formed under the Information Technology Act, 2000. It does not require any physical or digital signatures to make the terms of this policy binding. This privacy policy is a legally binding document. The terms of this privacy policy will be effective upon your use of our service. Please read this policy carefully, together with our Terms and Conditions of Use.

By visiting our Network, providing your information or availing our product/service, you expressly agree to be bound by the terms of this Privacy Policy and the applicable Terms and Conditions of Use. While accessing or using our services, you have given explicit consent to collect, use, share or otherwise process your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not access or use our Network or Service.

You acknowledge that you are disclosing Personal Information voluntarily. Prior to the completion of any registration process or prior to availing of any services offered by us, if you wish not to disclose any Personal Information, you may refrain from doing so; however, if you don't provide information that is requested, it is possible that the registration process would be incomplete and/or you would not be able to avail of our services.
